sense.def:
Kadar človek
manages to do something
, mu uspe nekaj narediti.

seg.quote: How he managed to find us is beyond me.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
manages an organization, business, or system
, je odgovoren za upravljanje organizacije, podjetja ali sistema.

seg.quote: She manages a chain of pet shops.

sense.def:
Kadar ljudje
manage
, živijo zadovoljivo, čeprav nimajo veliko denarja.

seg.quote: I don't want charity. I can manage.
I've always managed on a teacher's salary.
